title: Ctrl A1
characteristics_ch1: cell type: pancreatic cancer cell lines
characteristics_ch1.1: cell line: mixture of PANC-1, SW1990, BxPC-3, MIA PaCa-2
treatment_protocol_ch1: 10Gy X-radiation treatment was used for generating dying tumor cells. Exosomes were purified from the conditioned media using differential ultracentrifugation. Centrifugation was performed at 300 g, 2,000 g and 10,000 g to remove the live cells, dead cells and cell debris, respectively. The supernant was further purified using 0.22um filters. The crude extract of exosomes was obtained by ultracentrifugation (100,000 g). And the pallet was washed using PBS to remove the contaminated protein.
growth_protocol_ch1: Pancreatic cell lines PANC-1, MIA PaCa-2 and BxPC-3 were cultured with DMEM medium (Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle Medium, HyClone) with 2% FBS (Fetal Bovirne Serum with exosome depleting). SW1990 was cultured with 1640 medium (Roswell Park Memorial Institute-1640, HyClone) with 2% FBS(Fetal Bovirne Serum with exosome depleting).
extract_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was extracted using the Trizol reagent (Life technology) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
extract_protocol_ch1.1: RNA libraries were prepared for sequencing using standard Illumina protocols, and ~150 bp PCR amplicons (corresponding to ~22nt miRNAs) were selected
data_processing: Basecalls were performed using CASAVA version 1.8
data_processing.1: The adaptor sequences were trimmed and the adaptor-trimmed-reads (>= 15nt) were left by cutadapt software (v1.9.3).
data_processing.2: Trimmed reads from all samples were pooled, and miRDeep2 software (v2.0.0.5) was used to predict novel miRNAs
data_processing.3: The trimmed reads were aligned to the merged human pre-miRNA databases (known pre-miRNA from miRBase plus the newly predicted pre-miRNAs) using Novoalign software (v3.02.12) with at most one mismatch
data_processing.4: The read counts were normalized by TPM (tag counts per million aligned miRNAs) approach. Differentially expressed miRNAs between two samples were filtered through Fold change. Ddifferentially expressed miRNA between two groups were filtered by Fold Change and P-value.
data_processing.6: Supplementary_files_format_and_content: .xlsx files include tag reads, and normalized data (TPM), etc.
contact_laboratory: Shanghai Key Laboratory of Pancreatic Diseases
cell line:ch1: mixture of PANC-1, SW1990, BxPC-3, MIA PaCa-2
